entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
